Title: Chairman Mao calls on us to complete the democratic reform thorougly
Publisher: Zhongnan renmin chubanshe (中南人民出版社)
Notes: A model worker in conversation with his colleague workers, probably returning from an event where Mao gave a speech or was quoted. Right behind him workers are looking at a red booklet with a Mao portrait just visible on the first page - a gift the model worker received.The impressum states that this poster was "Edited by the Ministry of Culture of the Central South Military and Political Committee" (中南軍政委員會文化部編).
